enrollment.title: How to Enroll in an Iranian University
enrollment.desc: We make the enrollment process for international students in Iran simple and stress-free. Here’s a step-by-step guide:

step1.title: Choose Your University and Program

point1.link: list of accredited universities in Iran

step1.point2: Select the academic program that suits your goals.
step1.point3: Review the admission requirements for your chosen university.

step2.title: Prepare and Submit Your Documents
step2.translationService: We also provide professional translation services for your academic records.

step3.title: Receive Your Admission Letter
step3.description: Once we review your application and verify your documents, we’ll submit your request to the university. If accepted, you will receive an official admission letter.

step4.title: Apply for a Student Visa
step4.point1: After securing admission, the next step is to apply for an Iranian student visa.
step4.point2: We handle the entire visa process, including application, interview guidance, and final approval.
description: For details on obtaining a student visa, visit

step5.title: Complete Registration and Start Your Studies
step5.description: When you arrive in Iran, our team will assist you with finalizing your university registration. We also provide support with accommodation, student insurance, and any other services you may need.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyUs.point1-desc: Personalized guidance on university and program selection.
whyUs.point2-desc: We assist you from document submission to visa processing and settling in Iran.
whyUs.point3-desc: Our team communicates in Persian, English, and Arabic.
whyUs.point4-desc: Stay updated with accurate and official information from top Iranian universities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1-title: Deadlines vary by university, but generally:
faq.a1-item1: Spring (May) for Fall semester (starting in September).
faq.a1-item2: Summer (July) for Winter semester (starting in February).
faq.q2: Do I need to provide a language proficiency certificate?
faq.a2: Some universities require a language test, but many programs accept students without it.
faq.q3: How much does it cost to study in Iran?
faq.a3: Tuition fees vary based on the university and program, but studying in Iran is generally more affordable compared to many other countries.
